fields_of_interest: Consumers, International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Regional Policy, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Circular Economy Package, 
legislation on non-financial reporting for companies and other initiatives on corporate social responsibility, 
environmental regulations
organisation_name: The Sustainers spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością (Sustainers)
relevant_communication: Consultancy services for clients (among others: Ikea Poland, MB Recycling, Agaplast etc.) on circular economy business models and activities that can be implemented. Also membership in Working Group for Circular Economy Roadmap within the Ministry of Development in Poland.
goals__remit: The Sustainers is a private-owned company that focuses on mainstreaming sustainability. Our work focuses on sustainability consultancy for private, public and research and innovation sector as well as supporting sustainable production and consumption, including transition into circular economy.
